biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jonathan Hales (born May 10, 1937) is a British playwright and screenwriter who is noted for his work with Lucasfilm, including The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles television series and Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones.
